com.icodici.universa.contract.roles

Class SimpleRole

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.icodici.universa.contract.roles.Role
      • com.icodici.universa.contract.roles.SimpleRole
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.sergeych.biserializer.BiSerializable

    public class SimpleRole
extends Role
    Base class for any role combination, e.g. single key, any key from a set, all keys from a set, minimum number of key from a set and so on.

    IMPORTANT, This class express "any_of" logic, e.g. if any of the presented keys is listed, then the role is allowed.

        Parameters:
        name - is name of role
        keyRecord - is KeyRecord associated with role

      • SimpleRole

        public SimpleRole(java.lang.String name)
        Create new empty SimpleRole. Keys or records to role may be added with addKeyRecord(KeyRecord).
        Parameters:
        name - is name of role

      • SimpleRole

        public SimpleRole(java.lang.String name,
                  @NonNull java.util.Collection records)
        Create new SimpleRole. Records are initialized from the collection and can have the following types: PublicKey, PrivateKey, KeyRecord, KeyAddress, AnonymousId.
        Parameters:
        name - is name of role
        records - is collection of records to initialize role

      • cloneAs

        public SimpleRole cloneAs(java.lang.String name)
        Clone the role with a different names, using the same (not copied) key records, in the new copy of the container. So, it is safe to edit cloned keyRecords, while keys itself are not copied and are packed with Boss effeciently. More or less ;)
        Parameters:
        name - is new name for the role
        Returns:
        cloned SimpleRole
